mapper.select: select A.cineCode as cineCode, B.startotal as startotal, brandName, cineName, tel, addr1, addr2, addr3, logoImg FROM cinemaTable as A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT cineCode, pixel, sound, clean, service, seat, around, snack, trans, sum(pixel+sound+clean+service+seat+around+snack+trans)/8 AS startotal FROM reviewStarTable GROUP BY cineCode) as B on A.cineCode = B.cineCode
SELECT brandName FROM cinematable WHERE addr1 = #{addr1} GROUP BY brandName

SELECT A.cineCode as cineCode, B.startotal as startotal, brandName, cineName, tel, addr1, addr2, addr3, logoImg FROM cinemaTable as A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT cineCode, pixel, sound, clean, service, seat, around, snack, trans, sum(pixel+sound+clean+service+seat+around+snack+trans)/8 AS startotal FROM reviewStarTable GROUP BY cineCode) as B on A.cineCode = B.cineCode WHERE brandName=#{brandName} AND addr1=#{addr1}

SELECT A.cineCode as cineCode, B.startotal as startotal, brandName, cineName, tel, addr1, addr2, addr3, logoImg FROM cinemaTable as A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT cineCode, pixel, sound, clean, service, seat, around, snack, trans, sum(pixel+sound+clean+service+seat+around+snack+trans)/8 AS startotal FROM reviewStarTable GROUP BY cineCode) as B on A.cineCode = B.cineCode WHERE addr1=#{addr1}
SELECT * FROM cinematable WHERE cineName like CONCAT('%', #{sch_value} , '%')

SELECT concat(left(brandName, 1), cineCode) as cineCode FROM (SELECT brandName, CASE WHEN cineCode>=0 AND cineCode<10 THEN concat('00', cineCode) WHEN cineCode>=10 AND cineCode<100 THEN concat('0', cineCode) ELSE '' END AS cineCode FROM (SELECT brandName, IFNULL(MAX(cineCode),0) + 1 as cineCode FROM (SELECT count(cineName) as cineCode, brandName FROM cinemaTable WHERE brandName=#{brandName}) as AA) as BB) as CC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cinemaTable(cineCode, brandName, cineName, tel, addr1, addr2, addr3, logoImg, home, etc, wido, kyengdo, wdate) VALUES(#{cineCode}, #{brandName}, #{cineName}, #{tel}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{addr3}, #{logoImg}, #{home}, #{etc}, #{wido}, #{kyengdo}, now())
mapper.select: select A.cineCode as cineCode, B.startotal as startotal, brandName, cineName, tel, addr1, addr2, addr3, logoImg, home, etc, wido, kyengdo FROM cinemaTable as A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT cineCode, pixel, sound, clean, service, seat, around, snack, trans, sum(pixel+sound+clean+service+seat+around+snack+trans)/8 AS startotal FROM reviewStarTable GROUP BY cineCode) as B on A.cineCode = B.cineCode WHERE A.cineCode = #{cineCode}
SELECT concat(A.cineCode, '_', A.roomName) as roomCode, A.roomName as roomName FROM (SELECT cineCode, ifnull(MAX(roomName), 0)+1 as roomName FROM roomTable WHERE cineCode=#{cineCode}) as A
SELECT cineCode, pixel, sound, clean, service, seat, around, snack, trans, sum(pixel+sound+clean+service+seat+around+snack+trans)/8 AS startotal FROM reviewStarTable GROUP BY cineCode

SELECT cineCode, pixel/cnt as pixel, sound/cnt as sound, clean/cnt as clean, service/cnt as service, seat/cnt as seat, around/cnt as around, snack/cnt as snack, trans/cnt as trans, startotal/cnt as startotal FROM (SELECT cineCode, uid, sum(pixel) as pixel, sum(sound) as sound, sum(clean) as clean, sum(service) as service, sum(seat) as seat, sum(around) as around, sum(snack) as snack, sum(trans) as trans, count(uid) as cnt, sum(pixel+sound+clean+service+seat+around+snack+trans)/8 AS startotal FROM reviewStarTable WHERE cineCode = #{cineCode}) as A
